CustomField.description: For SDT 44574, for haul away Quotelines this field is populated based on location and Associated case's Haul_Away_Vendor, This should be revised if salesforce record exists and in future if there is any change in acorn
CustomField.inlineHelpText: SDT 445744, for haul away Quotelines this field is populated based on location and Associated case's Haul_Away_Vendor(api name), in future if these vendor names gets change in acorn one shall change these api names as well
CustomField.label: Haul Away Vendor
